request1:
SELECT model, speed, hd FROM PC
WHERE price < 500
request2:
SELECT DISTINCT maker FROM Product
INNER JOIN PC ON speed>='450' AND Product.model = PC.model
request3:
SELECT DISTINCT Product.type,Laptop.model,Laptop.speed
FROM Product, Laptop
WHERE type = 'Laptop' AND Laptop.model=Product.model AND
 Laptop.speed < ALL(SELECT speed
 FROM PC
 )
